Articles.Content: I've been a backer and player of KSP for a long time, but have only just now decided to bother with the forums. Hopefully, it'll turn out for the better.
Thanks for the welcome. Now if you'll excuse me, I have a trip to Duna to do....
Watch out for Ike. That jerk of a moon bothers me...

I actually just now escaped Duna. When I was slowing down to get low enough to gather science, an intercept with Ike popped up, but went away nicely. (I was also coming in at about a 70 degree angle.) Funny story about Ike, a buddy of mine actually managed to get slingshotted off of Ike twice before giving up. All this while I was standing behind him dying laughing.
~2000 day mission.... not my fastest mission so far...... I really need to learn how to efficiently change orbits. lol

I really need to learn how to efficiently change orbits. lol

Hello dude! Welcome to the forums! Also, a little tip: If you're planning to do inclination changes, do them in hig orbits. It will save you a lot of Delta-v! ^^
